text: Ruben Delgado Martin (born Augsut 27, 1976 in Santa Cruz de Tenerife) is a track and field athlete from Spain. He has a disability: He is blind and a T12/B2 type athlete. He raced at the 1996 Summer Paralympics. He race and finished in third in 800 meter T12 race. He raced at the 2000 Summer Paralympics. He finished fifth in the 1,500 meter T12 race. == References == Category:Spanish middle-distance runners Category:Living people Category:1976 births Category:Paralympic bronze medalists for Spain Category:1996 Summer Paralympics Category:2000 Summer Paralympics Category:Sportspeople with disabilities, type T12 Category:Sportspeople with disabilities, type B2 Category:People from the Canary Islands
title: Ruben Delgado Martin
